content: For those interested in C-CDA to and from FHIR Mapping (https://jira.hl7.org/browse/PSS-1799) the project page for C-CDA to and from US Core Mapping and meeting information is available on Confluence https://confluence.hl7.org/display/CGP/C-CDA+to+and+from+US+Core+Mapping

@Sajad Rezazadeh This is the main landing page in Confluence for the project. https://confluence.hl7.org/display/CGP/C-CDA+to+and+from+US+Core+Mapping

To get into the Meeting Minutes, navigate to this subordinate page: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/CGP/Project+Governance+and+Meeting+Information

The October 11th meeting has been cancelled due to the Federal holiday. The next meeting will be on October 18th.
Please review the recently posted documents on https://confluence.hl7.org/display/CGP/Mapping+Documents+for+Discussion
